Class SocketServerOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • eftaios.network.socket.server.SocketServerOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class SocketServerOutput
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SocketServerOutput(java.util.Map<java.math.BigInteger,OnlineGame> onlineGames, java.util.List<OnlineGameInfo> availableMatche)
      This class will handle the output stream side of the server writing to client

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendToClient(GameEvent event, Model model)
      This method is used to forward a model and a game event to the client without passing trough the model, it is used for not game communication i.e. when the client is not playing to a game but still connecting
      void setOutputStream(java.net.Socket socket)
      Set the output stream on which this object will write
      boolean stop()
      Check if this object needs to stop
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This object extends the observer interface and will observe the server's model when the model notify something the update method in this object will forward them to the client

      • SocketServerOutput

        public SocketServerOutput(java.util.Map<java.math.BigInteger,OnlineGame> onlineGames,
                  java.util.List<OnlineGameInfo> availableMatche)
        This class will handle the output stream side of the server writing to client
        Parameters:
        onlineGames - The Map containing the online games on the server
        availableMatches - The list holding the reference to the online games

    • Method Detail

      • setOutputStream

        public void setOutputStream(java.net.Socket socket)
        Set the output stream on which this object will write
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket holding the connection between server and client

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        This object extends the observer interface and will observe the server's model when the model notify something the update method in this object will forward them to the client
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - The server model
        arg - the game event

      • sendToClient

        public void sendToClient(GameEvent event,
                Model model)
        This method is used to forward a model and a game event to the client without passing trough the model, it is used for not game communication i.e. when the client is not playing to a game but still connecting
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be notified
        model - the model to be send it can be null or with a null game

      • stop

        public boolean stop()
        Check if this object needs to stop
        Returns:
        true if an error occurred and this object needs to stop
